name: DownloadInProgress
description:
DownloadInProgress is a game made for a 48 hours game jam we had between friends :)

The goal is simple:
- Finish the download as quickly as possible

BUT!
You will encounter bugs, crypto miners, viruses and malwares which are trying to slow you down!
Don't worry tho, you are armed with last generetion apps made to kill them all..

IN DEPTH:
- Bugs: Stops everything from running
     > Use the BugFixer to indentify and fix them
- Crypto miners: Slows your progress exponentialy by how many you have on your system
     > Use the PerformenceMonitor to find the overheating components, scan them and find the error codes needed to optimise your components
- Viruses: If you only have one of them, it'll be fine, your progress bar will only be stoped. But if you have more! You will start to lose progress! Be careful.
     > Use the virus removal kit to identify and hopefully remove them (you will need to search by yourself for the virus in the files 'ComputerFiles/'
- Last but not least, Malwares: They deactivate your performance checker in the performance monitor and your scan in your virus removal kit! Don't worry, viruses and crypto miners can still be identified, they are just harder to find :3

REQUIREMENT:
-You will need to download python (https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-394/) to play the game since this is the source code!

And, i recomand you not touching the 'status.txt' file to not break the game :)

Finally, you can check your highscores in the file 'highscores.txt'

Have fun!
